abstract: Michael Wolff has left his job as the editor of Adweek, ending a turbulent but brief tenure there.
snippet: Michael Wolff has left his job as the editor of Adweek, ending a turbulent but brief tenure there.
lead_paragraph: Michael Wolff, a combative and contrarian figure of Manhattan media for the last generation, has left his job as the editor of the trade publication Adweek, ending weeks of speculation over his job security there.

headline.main: Michael Wolff Steps Down as Editor of Adweek
